sentences.sContent: A purple may be made by dyeing a blue over a red.
sentences.sContent_eng: A purple may be made by dyeing a blue over a red.
sentences.sCn: 红色染上蓝色便可成为紫色。

sentences.sContent: She had a purple dress on with a silver-white necklace.
sentences.sContent_eng: She had a purple dress on with a silver-white necklace.
sentences.sCn: 她穿着一条紫色的连衣裙配着一条银白色的项链。

sentences.sContent: ...Why have tea farmers in Kenya decided to grow purple tea...
...Kibara says he has not received a higher price for his purple tea crop...
...What do researchers say about purple tea...
...He says the market for the tea is unstable and he is often forced to sell his purple tea for the same price as green tea leaves...
...He says there are not enough buyers willing to pay more for the purple tea...

synos.tran: 紫色的；帝王的；华而不实的

phrases.pCn: 紫心锭（右旋安非他命，兴奋剂）

trans.tranOther: a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue
having a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue
